title: DiscoverPdrsConfig
description: Describes the config used by the discover-pdrs task

stack.description: The name of the Task's CloudFormation Task, useful as a prefix

bucket.description: aws s3 buckets used by this task

useList.description: flag to tell ftp server to use 'LIST' instead of 'STAT'

httpListTimeout.description: Timeout (in seconds) for retrieval by HTTP/HTTPS provider

force.description: flag to force the processing of PDR's that have already been discovered
